courseSectionInformation: 3 undergraduate hours. 3 graduate hours. Prerequisite: THEA 453, THEA 455 and THEA 459.
description: Introduction to sound reproduction, recording, and basic systems design as applied to the modern theatre. 3 undergraduate hours. 3 graduate hours. Prerequisite: THEA 453, THEA 455 and THEA 459.
label: Sound Design I
